summary: Working on deep generative models for learning meaningful latent disentangled representations from video data. Currently working on Disentangled Variational Autoencoders that can learn distinct variables for time invariant and temporal aspects of video data allowing disentangling of content and motion features. The disentanglement is performed only through clever design of the probabilistic graphical model without any modifications to the ELBO objective
title: Unsupervised Representation Learning on Video Data

summary: TorchGAN is a lightweight framework built on top of PyTorch for training and evaluating Generative Adversarial Networks
title: TorchGAN

summary: A summer project under Programming Club, IIT Kanpur, that involved studying the theory of encoder decoder architectures and then building an attention based image captioning network trained on MSCOCO
title: Attention Based Models for Image Captioning

summary: Created during the Microsoft Code.Fun.Do 2018 AI Challenge, Case Studies is a legal consultant bot that analyses legal documents and answers questions about it
title: Case Studies
